attributes.contentHtml:
This is literally the shittiest host ever.
This kid Cloudbud started arguing in VC and defending free domains because he's a cheapass trying to run a host.
Now they started saying they do not care about a .tk domain or having a TOS/Privacy Policy while holding data already.
They're trying to sound cool while not even knowing what they're doing...

attributes.bio: bullying 5 year old host owners isn’t just a hobby, it’s a lifestyle, a reason to breathe, an escape from this cruel world filled with thieves. It’s art, the first gift you open on xmas /j

attributes.title: NexusNodes.tk | 90% Downtime - No TOS & Privacy Policy - Using .tk domain
